show_freetext.name: show_freetext
show_freetext.help: Show a freetext that has been entered before.

fields.name: name
fields.help: Identifier of the freetext that shall be shown.

freetext.name: freetext
freetext.help: A player can enter a free text that can be shown to other players in later stages. To show the text, simply add it in a stage page of another stage. It won't be used in the game theoretic analysis.

fields.name: maxLength
fields.help: Optionally, a maximum number of characters the user is allowed to enter

fields.name: minLength
fields.help: Optionally, a minimum number of characters the user is required to enter.
